scenario_text.value: We’re now approaching the enemy base.

We don’t know what’ll happen from here on
out... Keep your eyes and ears open, guys!

Right. We don’t know when a fight might
start.

You’re not looking too good, Shuuji. Are you
okay?
Uh...yeah. Don’t worry about it.
Hey, Kaito, got a second?
What is it?

Wouldn’t bringing Shuuji along in that state
put him in danger?

There’s no fog around, so maybe he can wait
here. Or we could have him turn back.
Good question... What do you think, Takuma?

That might work. I’m also worried about
taking Miyuki and Haru up ahead.

Lopmon’s with them, after all. If anything
happens, they can handle it.

Then let’s give it a shot. Who knows, he
might even like the idea, tired as he is.
That’s an awful idea!
What’s the problem?

Don’t force all the responsibility on Lopmon!
It’s too risky, with the fog and all!
I have to agree. Okay, how about this?

We’ll stay behind, too. That way, if anything
happens, we can all handle it together.
You and Labramon are staying back, too?

We’re heading straight into enemy territory,
y’know? I’d rather not lose more firepower.

My thoughts exactly! We could make do
without one of you...
But two? That’s too much of a handicap!
Then everyone should go together!

But it’s dangerous to bring people along in
such a state.

That’s no reason to leave them behind,
though...
What do you think we should do, Miu?
I just dunno...

Ain’t it a bad idea to leave him on his own,
though...?

We’re just going around in circles at this
rate! What’re we gonna do, Takuma?

It’s true that he isn’t in a good state...
But what should we do?

If only we could leave Shuuji behind...
I believe the rest of us would be in sync.

The fact that we can’t is the cause of all
this confusion, right?

Indeed... Nothing good will come of this,
with things as they are.

Still, we should decide as a group. Shuuji
won’t fare very well left to his own devices.
I’m also worried about Lopmon.

Lopmon is suffering all alone. If only that
human would try and connect with him...

(Shuuji and Lopmon... It’s tough to figure
out what to do with them.)

(I’d feel better if Miyuki and Haru stayed
back, but that’s a lot for Lopmon to handle.)

(But if Aoi and Labramon stay behind, that
puts more danger on those going in.)

(I hate the idea of leaving Shuuji behind...
but I have to treat it as a real option.)
(So, what should I decide?)
Shuuji stays with Miyuki and Haru.
Shuuji’s on his own.
Aoi should stay, too.

Shuuji, can you stay here with Miyuki and
Haru?
But then Lopmon will...

I know, but if I have to choose between that
problem and everyone’s safety, then...
I’m okay with it...
Are you freaking kidding me...?!
Shuuji?!

Are, are you staying I’M the burden here?!
Just dead weight, like Miyuki and Haru?!
Ah, no, that’s not what I...
But you are, you REALLY are!!!

I guess leaving Shuuji here on his own is an
option to consider.
Takuma?!
Well yeah, that’s true.

It’d get us all back on the same page, that’s
for sure.
Even you two?! Come on, now!
Are you freaking kidding me...?!

You, you plan on just abandoning me here? Me,
your LEADER?!

Let’s have Aoi and Labramon stay behind
with Shuuji, then.

Whoa now, my man, that’ll put a big dent in
our fighting force over here!

Still, that might be for the best... We dunno
if it’ll be safe back here, after all.
But still, that’s not the—
Are you kidding me...?!
Whoa! Don’t freak me out here, man.
To leave Aoi back here to guard me...

That’s the same as saying I can’t do anything
on my own!

Um, Shuuji? That’s not it, everyone’s just
worried about you, and—
I’m fine! I’m not tired!

If you all won’t go, then I’ll just go on my
own!
Ah, Shuuji! Wait up!

Shut your mouth! Stop talking to me, you
useless thing!
Weeelp, there goes our fearless leader.
Unnngh...

Is something wrong, Lopmon? You look so
upset.

Why... Why am I the only one that’s so...
despised?

Did I do something wrong? No...no, I haven’t
been bad at all...
Lopmon?! Are you okay?!
I... I don’t know. I’m feeling pretty shaky...
Sorry, I’d better go see Shuuji...
There he goes...
Guess we should head out, too.
You got that right.

We have NO IDEA what’s waiting ahead of us!
You must remain VIGILANT at ALL TIMES!

Ahaha, is that your Shuuji impression? You
hit it right on the head!
Knock it off, you two.
Okie dokie...

I have a real, real bad feeling about this,
Takuma.
Is Lopmon in danger somehow?

I think so... I got the feeling of complete
darkness.

Human hearts have an strong effect on us.
With Shuuji like this, things could get bad.
Bad, huh... For once, I hope you’re wrong.
Ho ho ho...

That boy... He seems to have a weak spot
I can exploit...
